adjective.description: Of, relating to, or designating the uppermost division of the Jurassic of Europe, in which Portland oolite occurs, sometimes regarded as a stage lying above the Kimmeridgian.

noun.description: The Portlandian stage or series of rocks. Chiefly with the.

origin: Mid 19th century; earliest use found in The North British Review. From the name of Portland + -ian, after Portland oolite.
